name: NitroRole
short: Welcome new nitro boosters and/or give them a special role!
description: Welcome new nitro boosters and/or give them a special role!
end_user_data_statement:
This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
Discord IDs of users may occasionally be logged to file as part of error logging.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing NitroRole. If anything doesn't work, you can report it on my issue tracker at <https://github.com/Jackenmen/JackCogs/issues>.

This cog saves images set with `[p]nitrorole setimage` to data path.
author: Jakub Kuczys (https://github.com/Jackenmen)
